title: Gemma Collins returns to TOWIE after vowing to never go back to 'embarrassing' co workers
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Gemma Collins has returned to The Only Way is Essex, despite vowing she would never appear on the show again.

She even branded her former car dealership co workers "embarassing" when she appeared on Celebrity Juice.

The audience erupted into boos when Gemma slammed her former colleagues for still selling cars while she had found fame and fortune.

Host Keith Lemon had asked The GC if she was done with TOWIE, and she said that she was.

She added that she needed to "move on" with her life.

(Image: LVT MEDIA)

But Gemma is officially back on the ITVBe show, as their official Instagram posted a photo of her sitting in a car.

They added the caption: "LOOK WHO'S BACK!!!"

Gemma excitedly reposted the photo on her account, and wrote alongside it: "THEY SEE ME ROLLING...❤️ filming for TOWIE tonight !

"They called her palace spoke to her peope... she drank her English breakfast from a fine china cup thought a while...... and then said ..... HELL YEAH #towieroyalty [sic]".

(Image: Instagram)

Gemma also previously claimed that she would never go back to England.

She had been in Hollywood with her Celebrity Big Brother housemate Jonathan Cheban.

She posted a video on her Instagram saying: "Hollywood is the place dreams are made of.

"I'm moving here, I'm just in heaven.

"I'm never going back to England."

(Image: MirrorOnline)

Gemma's return to TOWIE may have something to do with the fact that James "Arg" Argent , who has had a tumultuous on/off relationship with Gemma, has now been kicked off the show.

He was sacked for failing a drugs test, and Gemma recently called paramedics to his home after fears he had overdosed.

But he performed in Majorca, Spain, last night and looked happy and healthy as he wowed audiences with his tunes.

Dressed in a smart blue shirt and chinos, he reassured fans that he was feeling fine after a difficult couple of days.

(Image: MirrorOnline)

Arg said: "Ladies and gentlemen, my name is James "Arg" Argent.

"It's been a hell of a week for me, it's been a tough week but I'm so glad to be here tonight.

"You've really all cheered me up," he said before he launched into a rendition of Fly Me to the Moon.
description: The GC referred to herself as "TOWIE royalty" in a post announcing her dramatic return to the show
